title: National Walkout Day: Teens Take Charge of America's Gun Debate | Krysten Ritter
itunes:title: National Walkout Day: Teens Take Charge of America's Gun Debate | Krysten Ritter
description:
Thousands of students participate in a walkout to protest gun violence, and Krysten Ritter chats with Trevor about her superhero role in "Marvel's Jessica Jones."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
